title: For One Mother And Son, 'Punish Stew' A Frequent Showdown
teaser: One person's comfort food is another person's bad memory. For today's Found Recipe, we hear again from chef John Currence.
contentencoded:
One person's comfort food is another person's bad memory. For today's Found Recipe, we hear again from chef John Currence, who first shared the story of his mother's "Punish Stew" on All Things Considered on March 20, 2014.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
